website_summaries.verdict: Though we give the SmithBuilt dog crate high marks for its strong, durable construction, it is not practical for dog owners who need a basic, portable crate.
pros: A steel-constructed dog crate that is built to last
The SmithBuilt stands out for its rust- and stain-proof coating
Its easy-moving casters lock into place for added safety
cons: This model is expensive and heavy
It is more difficult to assemble than other models, and is not ideal for taking along in the car

customer_reviews.title: An expensive cage, that does not live up to ...
customer_reviews.text: An expensive cage, that does not live up to "Heavy duty". I bought it for my son's husky mix, who's smaller in stature, and about 65 pounds. He managed to break the latches and get out within a couple days of use. A lot of money for a cage that didn't work. This dog is not wild, he's 7 years old and rather calm but when he decides to escape from his crate - he uses his strength to bully his way out of the cage. Obviously the bars etc. are strong - but the way the openings are secured is inadequate, and he broke them with ease. This isn't a mastiff or a saint bernard - shouldn't have happened.
customer_reviews.author: HippieChick

customer_reviews.title: the floor is horrible with fine wire flooring which our dog had his ...
customer_reviews.text: Dog broke the bars on day 1, and completely out on day 2 of our purchase. If I could give 0 stars I would. In addition, the floor is horrible with fine wire flooring which our dog had his tags stuck and had to pry out a screaming dog. Not safe. Not comfortable. Not dog proof at all. Attached is a pic of Day 1. Clearly the dog, nor I was happy with it. Got a plastic kennel because we couldn't front the money, just a couple scratches and nothing more. No refund either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough for my german shepard
customer_reviews.text: Although it was a good size cage he has difficulty standing up all the way since its a little low, but the biggest issue is the bars. We got the cage because of fireworks season and his fear of them. He actually puts himself in the cage at night, but even inside he gets scared and starts to bite and bend the bars. He has already bent two sides and took off 1 bar completely. It seems that the bars are hallow.
customer_reviews.author: ladyvenom86

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: My ~50lb dog broke out of this rather quickly. She bent several bars and broke one completely off, leaving a rather sharp tube. This is disappointing. The bars are hollow and not welded to the frame and beyond looking imposing, it does little to keep a nervous dog contained. Extremely disappointing. It actually took her less time to break free from this than the "cheaper" standard wire crate I had before. I suggest the manufacturers take a look at the definition of indestructible and go back to work on their design as this is far from it, and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! The escape artist has not escaped!
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me I would not regret buying it and she is correct! The only thing is I had to put the tray inside the crate, she got one of her toes caught in the wire bottom. She has eaten a half dozen beds so she cannot have a bed in the crate. The noise is horrific when she gets excited but, she is deaf so she does not hear it. I am trying to figure out something to put between the wire bottom and the tray to keep the sound down. But she is not escaping anymore and that was the goal of buying a new crate.
customer_reviews.author: gbc

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this CONVERTABLE DOG  CAGE
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to all who answered my questions. Set up was quick and easy. My concern was my puppy outgrowing the height of the cage. When my dog outgrows its height the top can be removed completely without affecting the sturdiness of the cage. It is large and roomy and VERY STURDY. I like the idea that's its on wheels and sits 5.5 inches off the floor it can be easily moved and folds away nicely. The inside area is 27 inches high. Like I mentioned the top can be removed which makes it ideal for very tall dogs. . .Its well worth the money. Any questions just email me.
customer_reviews.author: N. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, looks very nice, and it WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This crate is fantastic! My dog was an escape artist - even with a cone on her head from knee surgery - from prior crates. It's so well-built, and she likes doing in it as I've put several comfy dog pillows in there too. I added water bowls that attach to the sides too. I wish I had started with this crate.
customer_reviews.author: PYL

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: very heavy duty, easy to setup. i did upgrade it a little, i upgraded the bolt to the same size, just different threading so i could use wingnuts to make this super easy to setup and tear down. I also upgrade the locks on this unit to the barrel slide locks as i felt the little latches could easily be messed with by any semi intelligent dog. i also bolted into place with several big "U" bolt style locks the grate on the bottom as well as the top latch. so far so good. zero worries now that he will break out. and our dog is a big boxer/mastiff mix.
customer_reviews.author: forsale18

customer_reviews.title: good for your money has flaws
customer_reviews.text: For the price this crate is well built, but the latches are cheaply made and very easy to open, as well the wheels are sub par made of plastic. My dog is very smart and will easily figure out the latches on this cage. I dislike the 3" gap between each bar as he is able to fit ilhis paw through and drag things into his cage, I also dislike the grate as I feel it is rather cruel. The aluminum has sharp placed where it was not sanded around the wholes for the nuts and bolts. Overall nice cage with a much better price tag than its competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Pointergurl91

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: My dog has anxiety when we leave the house and needs to be crated. This crate was marketed as highly durable and will hold up great. My dog busted the latches on the door within 3 days, making us have to chain it shut. Then he was able to bend the bars enough to get his head out. He also scooted it across the floor and demolished our drywall from the inside of the crate. The flooring on this crate also completely destroyed. This is not heavy duty at all for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M

customer_reviews.title: Great unless your dog turns into The Hulk while in her kennel!!
customer_reviews.text: So where to begin. Our female Boxer hated being in her crate. This was the 3rd one we got, because she destroyed the others. This one the outer walls and doors held up fine, but on the inside, well not so much. Shr was able to break the removable floor within a week. I mean, literally broke the "welds". She was quite the destructive dog while in her kennel. I would recommend reinforcing the removable grate floor. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - PRODUCT IS NOT THE SAME AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: I have two SmithBuilts already and I am happy with them. These are cheap, flimsy, broken upon arrival, all THREE were wrong color (I can only surmise that this was NOT an accident). I think they tried to pull off a bait n switch and substitute cheap made in China products or SmithBuilt quality has completely taken a sinker. Save yourself the headache, disappointment and money - shop local if possible, so scammers don’t get away with this.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice Heavy Duty Cage that folds up for travel
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and the ease of putting up and taking down for travel....Very heavy duty design. It would have got 5 stars but the bottom grate the dog lives on was poorly welded and several welds were broken. It heavy @ about 90lbs. but thats what I needed for my King Size German Shepherd...he is only 50lbs at 14 wks so he's going to continue to grow so this cage fits the bill perfectly for his growing months
customer_reviews.author: wdodge45

customer_reviews.title: Great Kennels with some modifications
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The kennels just need a more reliable and stronger latch, I back up the door with a chain. They also need a little more height for the size of crate. I placed 1/2" rubber stall matt on the wire kennel flooring to make it more stable as I have a GSD in it and I don't think dogs should sit on wire. Also attached HDPE on lower half to add a bit of privacy. Its Working fine and I like the larger floor space it gives to the dog than a Vari-kennel, much more secure than a wire kennel. I really like the side door for placement so it doesn't take up so much floor space in width.
customer_reviews.author: Marie D

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Shipping.... Great Cage!
customer_reviews.text: "Bought this cage for my 63# pit. She has got out of 3 of the wire ones. The only problem I have with it was the shipping. When it got to me.. One of the bars was bent. Not bad. Just a bit. I can deal with that. Then on the one hinge the 3 rivits are broken out. This I am NOT happy with. I am going to try to rivit it back together if that doesn't work I will have to use screws and fix it that way. SmithBuilt Crates has to watch who they have shipping their product. FexEx doesn't seem to care if the boxes and product in them are damaged!
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: Great crate
customer_reviews.text: After my puppy destroyed one of the regular crates, we decided to go heavy duty. If he has attempted to get out of it, there's no evidence! His bed is in there and he spends his nights in there and whenever we aren't home.
customer_reviews.author: Becky B.

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: I have big male Boxers who kept destroying crates. I would zip tie the crates and secure them in every way possible but they found a way out. I decided to get one of these as a desperate measure. It worked! They haven't gotten out once. I did have to zip tie the top shut and I really wish it had a solid bottom.
customer_reviews.author: WBX

customer_reviews.title: Great kennel.
customer_reviews.text: Great kennel... however my 90lb Pitt bull still managed to find his way out by breaking the tiny locks on the change. I would recommend you reinforce them with chains or something else if you plan on keeping a strong dog in here that like's to play Houdini
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Tallini

customer_reviews.title: Good Cage
customer_reviews.text: Before I said some negative stuff about the order fullfillment process but after ordering a few more of these and having the process work out better I can say it is a really good product as well as a good value. Almost imposible to find as sturdily built cage for the money. only issue was in one of the places where the feet screw in there was a stray weld making installing the wheel difficult. My dremel tool fixed that right up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Not escape proof for strong dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Holes do not match up when assembling it. I had to use a drill. My dog tore out 2 of the bars and has bent them up pretty bad. We pad locked it from the start so he hasn't escaped yet and we have been clamping angle iron to keep him from getting out of the hole. The bars seem sturdy but if they are hollow.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the purchasing and delivery of this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the purchasing and delivery of this product. It was simple to set up, even though 2 of the holes did not line up. One of the front door latches has wiggle in it and she took advantage of it! She has bent 2 bars, but she gave up at some point. Very well made crate...good for our very anxious lab!
customer_reviews.author: Pammie Kay

customer_reviews.title: What can I say!? except... ...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say!? except... Heavy Duty is CORRECT.. not only that but it's a very handsome looking CRATE!!!!! My Pit/Retriever mix has NOT been able to chew/bend this one.. i hope that remains the case.. because he's caused havoc on the other "normal" crates~! IF anything changes, I'll let you know!~!
customer_reviews.author: JoanCT

customer_reviews.title: perfect blend of strength and amenities
customer_reviews.text: very strongly constructed to prevent " break outs" by even the strongest and most determined of dogs. convenient-top and front openings for ease of ingress and egress and cleaning. Mesh floor to allow accidents to settle on the tray below leaving pet clean and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Ken St. James

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality product. I raise high drive working dogs and they can be destructive. This is the best containment I have bought thus far. The latches are better than others. I love the functionality. Product shipped very timely and received in good condition. Easy to put together. I will be ordering more from Mix Wholesale to use in my vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: kool keith

customer_reviews.title: the only thing that I don't like about it is that you have to use the ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a 5 star rating, the only thing that I don't like about it is that you have to use the grate, leaving less head room for large dogs.I plan on cutting the supports off any welding them to support the bottom pan.I wish they would give you the option to use the grate or not.Over all it is a very strong well made cage,just wish had an option with the grate not all dogs need one.Very easy to put together and love the wheels, makes it easy to clean underneath without scratching floors.PLEASE MAKE ONE WITH THE GRATE OPTION SO I DON'T HAVE TO MODIFY IT!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More like a tiger cage!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pit bull with separation anxiety and he destroyed three different cages prior to this one. This is very strong and you can have a piece of mind knowing your dog won’t escape from this cage.
customer_reviews.author: Joe L

customer_reviews.title: The craftsmanship was poor. The hinges were not welded in the right ...
customer_reviews.text: The craftsmanship was poor. The hinges were not welded in the right place. The door did not close and the top had to be forced closed to fit. Ended up returning to seller. Seller was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kegger

customer_reviews.title: Very strong cage for most dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Very strong cage for most dogs. My dog apparently is herculean and bent the bars .. which by the way, I cannot bend back ;-(.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Diosana

customer_reviews.title: Great price...crappy product.
customer_reviews.text: Several rivets were "popped", thus leaving sharp edges on hinges exposed to the dog. Item was returned for complete refund.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This dog "trap" has far exceeded my expectations. My dog loves to sleep in there with the door open and it's very safe and secure. Best bargain out there! Plus, it was a cinch to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Kate M.

customer_reviews.title: Locks are no good
customer_reviews.text: Great construction except for the locks. We had to use zip ties on the top gate and an extra latch on the front when our pup needed to be crated.
customer_reviews.author: Damon C.M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: SCREW CAME OUT AND MY DOG ESCAPED ON DAY 2... DESTROYED BLINDS...
customer_reviews.author: Bryan K

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong as It Appears
customer_reviews.text: My 50 pound dog has pretty much destroyed this. It look very sturdy but that is deceiving. The vertical "bars" are really just weak, easily bent steel tubing that is not welded very well. I will need to weld steel rods horizontally to reinforce the sides. Not worth anywhere near the almost $200 spent. More made in China junk.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Gregor

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! My dog had busted out of two crates and we had no idea what to do anymore. He finally feels secure in this one. The only downside is that we can't travel with this one. But my husband, my 100 lb dog and our cat all fit in the crate when we first constructed it :)
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Norris

customer_reviews.title: It was suppose to be a heavy duty crate however ...
customer_reviews.text: It was suppose to be a heavy duty crate however , the bolts and screws kept coming out. This crate isn't meant for escape artists. However , when I inquired about the crate they sent me an idea new kit.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Pellegrino

customer_reviews.title: This is the best cage that I have bought out of the 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cage that I have bought out of the 3 purchased off of Amazon. Although, there were a few hiccups when putting it together, it was not a major show stopper. I have pitbull/german shephard mix and he was destroying the other cages I purchased. He doesn't do that with this one. No more bending the wires to get out or jiggling the door to get out. This really is a heavy duty cage.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Gipson

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for the best crate
customer_reviews.text: Really well built! Very easy to assemble. The latches are very heavy duty but easy and quick to use. Purchased for a boxer mix with severe separation anxiety. Love this crate!
customer_reviews.author: Michele D. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction!
customer_reviews.text: Great cage for my large strong dog. My dog tore through wire and plastic cages in a matter of days. This cage and it's hardware is well made and keeps my big boy from destroying my home while I'm gone(he has separation anxiety). He is so comfortable in it he lays in it with the door open. Great buy at a great price! Look no further
customer_reviews.author: zee saul

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and escape proof!
customer_reviews.text: Other then some of the hardware not quite lining up, i am very satisfied with this product. We have a shepard that destroyed several kennels before this one. He is not getting out of this one be it destroying or figuring out how to open it. Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Tanguay

customer_reviews.title: One of the best products I have purchased online
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products I have purchased online. Absolutely worth the money. It met expectations . The only problem is that even though the product is made to perfection my dog was still able to escape the locking mechanisms. He is just an amazing dog I guess. I am completely satisfied with my purchase though
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: SmithBuilt  heavy duty dog cage
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst kennels i have ever purchased! I bought 4 for my dogs the first thing that broke was all the door laches then my dog was able to get threw the metal door! He bent the metal back far from heavy duty!
customer_reviews.author: Tara McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Change the locks
customer_reviews.text: The crate is well built however the locking latches could be designed differently at my husky figured out how to unlock it with in a day so I have had to reinforce the crate by adding a chain so he can not open the door on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great design, a great value-buy for your animal
customer_reviews.text: This crate WORKS! We have a 70lb lab/pit mix and she doesn't even try to chew on this one! Solid, great design, a great value-buy for your animal.
customer_reviews.author: B. Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: My husky pup broke out of many cages until this ...
customer_reviews.text: My husky pup broke out of many cages until this one :) Now, that I have a 6 foot fence around the property I dont even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: This is alright.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the dog in. Definitely didnt assemble properly though, the top has about a 2 inch gap. Latches are kinda cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The box was beat up pretty bad and 2 bars and bottom support were bent
customer_reviews.text: The product came very quickly. The box was beat up pretty bad and 2 bars and bottom support were bent. I straightened them out as best I could. It does seem well built. My escape artist boxer loves it and cannot get out. She seems more relaxed. Something needs to be done to address the shipping damage however.
customer_reviews.author: patrick burns

customer_reviews.title: Love this large cage as my female Pit could figure ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this large cage as my female Pit could figure out how to get out of every other cage we had no matter what we did. This is big, off the ground and she likes being in it even when we are home. Sigh of relief , happy dog, happy owner.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Wilber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. However
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. However, the shipping container needs rethought. One of the wheels was broke, had to gorilla glue It. Its holding for now. One of the riveted hinges was broke,but once the cage is bolted together it seemes sturdy enough for my use. Lastly the door catch to keep the door from swinging in was broke as well. Overall for the money you cant beat it
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: I hate assembling anything but I must say that this was ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I would have purchased this first, but three cages later...my dog with separation anxiety is now safe and secure. I hate assembling anything but I must say that this was easy for me and had it done in no time! Also, the cost was great! It was recommended to me to get a level 3 brand, but after reading reviews and comparing construction with this...I made a great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lynn Platts

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy frame. The only things I would like to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy frame. The only things I would like to see improvements on is one a thicker drop pan making it stronger. And more options to be able to change which side the door opens.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Peterson

customer_reviews.title: But other than that this has been great. We replaced one that our dog had broken ...
customer_reviews.text: Similar to other reviews the only downside is the latch on it. But other than that this has been great. We replaced one that our dog had broken the rods in the cage door off of. Needless to say, he isn't getting out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and far better quality than several of the other "heavy duty" crates we have purchased. We have rescue dogs, and we have not had any problems with this model.
customer_reviews.author: V. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Our Shepard puppy got out of our big previous crate twice by somehow breaking the metal spokes. We had to find something to keep her in but give her the room and something she can grown in to. She absolutely loves going into her new crate and has plenty of room and never gets out! Even our big dog wants to go in there with her! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brittnei Newcomb

customer_reviews.title: Great cage
customer_reviews.text: It would have got 5 stars if it had better locks other than that it's a hell of a cage or jail cell
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: My dog is crazy. This cage is built for crazy.
customer_reviews.text: My dog hasn't escaped or damaged it yet! I don't think she could.. The latches didn't seem like they would work but so far they have. If they do fail the cage is pretty easy to secure w/ padlock and chain. My dog hasnt ejected the bottom yet, either. It seems like it is fairly comfortable for her. I'm thinking this cage may actually last!
customer_reviews.author: jeanna hill

customer_reviews.title: Substantial crate
customer_reviews.text: Very substantial crate! Our dog could not escape from this crate like he did the black wire crate. He seems to be more relaxed knowing he isn't able to break out.
customer_reviews.author: annabelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 60 lb escape artist
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! We've had this kennel for almost a week and our escapee hasn't gotten out since. I have a 60 lb Shepherd mix and the XL is a perfect size for him. Hopefully we will be using this kennel for months to come, his kennels on average last about 1 month!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great crate for price the raised bed helps with dog hair
customer_reviews.text: We have a dog that tears apart normal crates she met her match on this one
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Ok crate but not for escape artist dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog already broke through the side. I've had to rig it myself to try to prevent him. Just send the bars would have been built better.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This crate was delivered less then 24 hrs after I ordered it. It came un perfect condition and was easy enough for my son and his girlfriend to put together in 30 minutes. We have an 80 lb pit bull who has eaten 3 couches this crate is a godsend.
customer_reviews.author: Toikemus

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: Loving the crate. My 3yr old male Bullmastiff has met his match with it. Only problem is the unit is not completely square but that does not take away from it doing what it was designed to do.....keep a big strong dog in it. Would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Went together super easy! My dog is very comfy in her new crate. The fit and finish was right on point and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Keath L Flohr

customer_reviews.title: Works Great. ..Easy to Assembly. ..Solid Construction
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our baby Boxer, and he took to it immediately! He has been in crate training and we are both very busy and even with the best of intentions, we miss getting to him to let him out by an hour or two, it has a nice floor to allow his bathroom movement's to go down to catch pan. Easy to set up, clean. He is
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Galan

customer_reviews.title: doing what I needed it to.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, my only complaint is one of the welded hinges that folds up was broke so I went to the hardware store to get some screws to attach it. It huge but my pit mix had destroyed 2 cages until I got this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C Samples

customer_reviews.title: This crate is fantastic!! My Great Pyrenees would destroy wire crates ...
customer_reviews.text: This crate is fantastic!! My Great Pyrenees would destroy wire crates within an hour of me being gone but he has not destroyed this one. He actually likes to be in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its weight is a sign of its reliability.
customer_reviews.text: Latches seem a bit flimsy, and casters are cheap plastic. But other than that great and well made product. Very sturdy once everything is bolted together, good heavy steel and great size. Can't beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: but that was simple and easy, but for the price it was well worth ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds my German Shepard that has separation issues in with slight modification I had to reenforce the top door and the front latches, but that was simple and easy, but for the price it was well worth it and it is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong cage, with plenty of rom for my Lab-Sheppard ...
customer_reviews.text: Strong cage, with plenty of rom for my Lab-Sheppard mix. Would be a 5 star, but the frame is slightly uneven so the top does not fit cleanly on, and the door must be pushed in to be locked
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Dog cage
customer_reviews.text: The is very well built. Easy to transport. The dog seems to love it. My only complaint is the latches on the door. Do not care for them.
customer_reviews.author: Tim McMeans

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it is holding up to this escape artist.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: This crate works out great for my 80lb Lab
customer_reviews.text: This crate works out great for my 80lb Lab. He tore up the thinner wire crates, because of his seperation anxiety, so we got this one. Although the door on the front is tough to close, due to the alignment being off a little. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice Burgess

customer_reviews.title: My American pitbul can not get out of it like all the other dog cages she destroyed
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Amazon smithbuilt heavy duty dog crate did the trick. My American pitbul can not get out of it like all the other dog cages she destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good but my big dog bent the bars with his mouth. I bent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Giambra

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this product, I have had 2 wire kennels over the last 8 months in which my Shepard has just bent all out of shape, but not this one. However it was thrown around during g shipping and slightly bent which I was not too happy about
customer_reviews.author: Joe Graminski

customer_reviews.title: Houdini
customer_reviews.text: We have a german shorthaired pointer that can not be contained. Wire crate - destroyed. Plastic airline crate same. I think this might do the trick. Two weeks in, and it seems to be working out for us.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Morgan

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good crate. Our dog has damaged the wire cages ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good crate. Our dog has damaged the wire cages and this one seems to work. As stated by other reviewers, the latches are not very good or substantial, but you can figure out ways to work around them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: dog bent bars with her teeth. should be solid bars.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Latches could be more stable. But it's strong enough to keep our escape artist contained so far
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Our first is still great after 3 years of use and we purchased a ...
customer_reviews.text: This crate has saved my house! It is strong and I think the dogs feel much more secure than the flimsy crates. well worth the money. Our first is still great after 3 years of use and we purchased a second for when we foster dogs so we don't have to panic every time we leave the house. The only thing ive had to fix is the top. Ive electrical tapped it shut because one foster bounced her way out the top! other than that awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Catiev123

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this purchase. This is a super heavy crate and is exactly what I needed for my furry escape artist.

customer_reviews.title: Very complete kit and everything goes together easy and fast
customer_reviews.text: A must have for puppies or adult dog's. Very complete kit and everything goes together easy and fast. Heavy duty! Might be able to hold Lions :)

customer_reviews.text: Great product! Our dog was able to get out of every other cage we purchased. This cage is well constructed and keeps him safely contained.

customer_reviews.title: Separation Anxiety
customer_reviews.text: Awesome crate! We had to reinforce the doors with dog choke chains and metal belt clips (like for keys). He hasn't been able to escape yet! For a dog that hates being crated, he will now go in on his own!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, easy to use and very heavy duty. Excellent product for a pet that has learned to push doors open on the common carrier or wire crates.
